attributes.action: put forward a motion that unnecessary lighting and neon signs in out of town shopping centres and retail parks be turned off after 11pm each night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By ensuring that unnecessary lighting and neon signs are turned off after a certain time at night we will save energy and help to reduce carbon output.

Is there any need for such bright lights and neon signs to be on at 3am in the morning?
